content: **knitted jumper for men in drops fabel the piece is worked top down with raglan and double neck sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fa-546 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops fabel from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 300-350-400-450-450-450 g colour 604 ocean view **needles** drops circular needles size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needles size 2 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
